matrix.db
Class IconMail

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.IconMail
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class IconMail
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Models a logical representation of a Matrix icon mail object. Also used to access a user's inbox. A subbordinant class (IconMailContent) holds the "guts" of the icon mail.

See Also:
Serialized Form
